### Tender Notification#
#### Office Furniture Procurement
#### Reference: cb-1-40378168
#### Amendment: 5
#### Solicitation Number: ISED-210063
#### Tender Closing Date: Thursday, March 8, 2024, 2:00 PM
#### Expected Contract Start Date: Monday, March 25, 2024
#### Expected Contract End Date: Monday, March 31, 2025

#### Tender Description:
Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada (ISED) invites bidders to submit a proposal for the supply and installation of office furniture to the National Capital Region.

#### Procurement Category:
* Government of Canada (GD)

#### Notice Type:
* Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Invitation to Tender (ITT)

#### Procurement Method:
* Competitive - Open Bidding

#### Selection Criteria:
* Lowest Price

#### Regions of Opportunity:
* National Capital Region (NCR)

#### Bidder Contact:
* Sonia Gauthier
* Email: [sonia.gauthier@ised-isde.gc.ca](mailto:sonia.gauthier@ised-isde.gc.ca)
* Phone: (819) 664-7267

#### Notice URL and Document Attachments:
The tender notice and supporting documents can be accessed on the Canada Procurement Intelligence Portal (https://buyandsell.gc.ca/). Please refer to the following links for the bid solicitation documents and addendum:

* Bid Solicitation (ISED-210063): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32769/ised210063---rfb--furniture-en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32769/ised210063---rfb--furniture-en.pdf)
* Addendum 1: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32769/ised210063---rfb--furniture-en-amend-001.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32769/ised210063---rfb--furniture-en-amend-001.pdf)

#### Security Requirement:
This procurement is subject to a security requirement. Bidders are advised to review the bid solicitation and supporting documents for additional information.
